value.0: Greetings, <Master/Mistress>, might you be interested our fine Servents?
Are you sure?
I can buy it back from you for <CUSTOM2101> coins!
Excellent! What can I help you with about our Servents?
Sorry to hear that. I do hope you'll return soon.
Why, to carry your junk, err, I mean your precious items, of course.
All the slaves come with a Pack Box you may load what you like in it. They are all well trained though and will serve you faithfully. Would you like to look at what I have?
Well.....the back pack is dropped on the ground for you to access it. If you want you can purchase a new Servent and reassign that Pack Box to the new servent.
Well I have various types of trained slaves for you to choose. Depending on the loads you need them to help carry.
The selection is what you see around the shop. Tell me which one you like.
Well....you don't have enugh coin for that one. Can I help with something Less expensive?
A fine animal. I can prepare it for you?

Excellent! Here you are! Come back again!

I will purchase this Pack Animal when you don't need it any longer. Just come back to me when you do. I charge a 50% fee to buy it back.
Nevermind.
I would like to sell my Servent.
Yes. I would like to sell it back to you.
I changed my mind.
Done. Here you go. Was a servent.
Yes I would.
Just looking. I will come back again some other time.
No, I don't think so today.
What exactly does one use a servent for?
What happens if the Servent dies?
Thanks for the info.
I think I could use a servent. How much are they?
Well what do you have?
I like the <CUSTOM2119> for <CUSTOM2219> coins.
I like the <CUSTOM2118> for <CUSTOM2218> coins.
I like the <CUSTOM2117> for <CUSTOM2217> coins.
I like the <CUSTOM2116> for <CUSTOM2216> coins.
I like the <CUSTOM2115> for <CUSTOM2215> coins.
I like the <CUSTOM2114> for <CUSTOM2214> coins.
I like the <CUSTOM2113> for <CUSTOM2213> coins.
I like the <CUSTOM2112> for <CUSTOM2212> coins.
I like the <CUSTOM2111> for <CUSTOM2211> coins.
I like the <CUSTOM2110> for <CUSTOM2210> coins.
Yes. Let me look again.
Sounds like a fine deal to me.
Thanks and I'll remember that.
